text.section:
When the General Assembly is not in session, any decision that relates to or affects a member of a committee of the General Assembly shall be made:
as to a Senate member, by the President; and
as to a House member, by the Speaker.

The responsibilities of the President and the Speaker under this section include:
appointing members of committees;
appointing officers of committees; and
setting the dates, times, and places for committee meetings.
